trans-unit.source: Defines a condition that guards/drives the execution of a certain activity within a workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 定義條件，這個條件會保護/驅動工作流程定義內某個活動的執行。

trans-unit.source: It has an event of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> to return the result of the condition.
trans-unit.target: 它有 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionalEventArgs" /> 型別的事件，可傳回條件的結果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the constructor to create a new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式 (Constructor)，建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The code also creates two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> class instances and an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼也會建立兩個 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> 類別執行個體和 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the ConditionedActivityGroup SDK sample from the SimpleCAGWorkflow.designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 SimpleCAGWorkflow.designer.cs 檔案中＜ConditionedActivityGroup SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Using ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [使用 < ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the condition is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 在評估條件時發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to attach a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition.Condition> event handler for the current <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會示範如何附加目前 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition.Condition> 執行個體的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> 事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the ConditionedActivityGroup SDK sample from the SimpleCAGWorkflow.designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 SimpleCAGWorkflow.designer.cs 檔案中＜ConditionedActivityGroup SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Using ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [使用 < ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984)。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition.Condition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 事件的 <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition.Condition" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associated with this condition.
trans-unit.target: 與這個條件相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> for this condition evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 用於此條件評估的 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the underlying condition.
trans-unit.target: 評估基礎條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the condition evaluates to true; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果條件評估為 true，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> of interest.
trans-unit.target: 重要的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 之目標的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the subject of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> 的主體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> bound to the activity by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind" /> 繫結至活動。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bind" /> or <paramref name="targetType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bind" /> 或 <paramref name="targetType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
